alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 30 at 1:19AM MST until July 30 at 3:15AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING FOR GILA COUNTY... At 119 AM MST, Gauge reports indicated high water levels along Tonto Creek due to upstream rainfall. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks, streams, and low water crossings. Rapid rises have been reported on Tonto Creek. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Tonto Basin. The following low water crossings may experience flooding: A Crossing, Bar X Crossing, and Store Crossing. The current gauge reading on Tonto Creek at 1:15am MST was 4.5 feet. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
